description: a(n)=T(6,n), array T given by A047848.
formula: (9^n + 7)/8. - _Ralf Stephan_, Feb 14 2004a(0)= 1, a(1)= 2, a(n)= 10*a(n-1)-9*a(n-2) for n>1. G.f.: (1-8x)/(1-10x+9x^2). [From _Philippe Del√©ham_, Oct 06 2009]a(n)=9*a(n-1)-7 (with a(0)=1) [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 06 2010]
maple: a[0]:=0:a[1]:=1:for n from 2 to 50 do a[n]:=9*a[n-1]+1 od: seq(a[n]+1, n=0..17); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 20 2008
mathematica: a = {}; ZZ = 1; Do[ZZ = ZZ + 3^(2x); AppendTo[a, ZZ], {x, 0, 17}]; a - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 03 2007
